law.text: Notwithstanding the provisions of KRS 248.655, county allocations may be used for projects before the completion of a comprehensive plan or strategic plan as determined by the board or if they fall under the conditions described in KRS 248.709(5)(b) or (c) or meet the criteria in KRS 248.711(2).
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 530, sec. 7, effective April 26, 2000.
